about_the_game:
"PWN'ong Duel of Balls" is a fun and exciting DLC that completely changes the game to more of a table tennis type of game with multiple balls! The goal here is still to score more points than your opponent when the timer runs out, but scoring points comes by getting balls past your opponent rather than by breaking bricks.

The longer a ball stays in play, the more points it is worth! This makes for constant struggle and priority between players for the most point worthy balls in play.

The blow attack remains in this version, but not to blow your opponent! Instead, you'll both be using your blow attack to try and hit balls near your opponent to deflect them into the goal at ridiculous speeds! This is a truly unique aspect of the game that creates furious and exciting battles!

Every character including call the DLC characters you own can be used in "PWN'ong Duel of Balls"! They will be stripped of their unique powers and abilities but keep their look and personal traits such as paddle size and movement speed.

...Can you "PWN" at smashing balls when and where it counts?

The goal here is still to score more points than your opponent when the timer runs out, but scoring points comes by getting balls past your opponent rather than by breaking bricks.

The blow attack remains in this version, but not to blow your opponent! Instead, you'll both be using your blow attack to try and hit balls near your opponent to deflect them into the goal at ridiculous speeds! This is a truly unique aspect of the game that creates furious and exciting battles!

Every character including call the DLC characters you own can be used in "PWN'ong Duel of Balls"! They will be stripped of their unique powers and abilities but keep their look and personal traits such as paddle size and movement speed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB graphics card minimum
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: "PWN'ong Duel of Balls" is a fun and exciting DLC that completely changes the game to more of a table tennis type of game with multiple balls! The longer a ball stays in play, the more points it is worth making for furious and exciting battles of the balls!
